Text.Page:
This surveying is going much more slowly than I was hopingâ€”and certainly more slowly than Ackerly was expecting. These pesky {@LinkCreature:5#14#Muddy Sporewalkers} keep wandering around, blocking my way.

If you could get them out of my way, I'd be able to actually finish the job here and get reports back to Ackerly.

Oh, thanks! It's going to be so much easier to finish this surveying without those pests in the way.

Here's something for your trouble.
